entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrading from 6.0.11 to Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Signalr.Client 7.0 introduced System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException #45012
  • Continue reducing the size of Blazor WebAssembly apps #45010
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Hybrid + Web #45004
  • Web API broken in .NET 7.0 after trimming #44997
  • Cannot receive push data from API when build app release with proguard android #44993
  • dotnet 6 app stopped working after update to VS 2022 17.4 #44991
  • Method 'get_ServerSideSessions' in type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer.ApiAuthorizationDbContext`1' from assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' does not have an implementation. #44990
    Discussions
  • ASP.NET Core Module v2 17.0.22292.0 Very serious bug #45006

Closed

  • ASPNetCore v7.0.0 failing to build: Missing NuGet's #44962
  • Link is mis-rendering based on the current page #24455
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM app fails to launch with 7.0 runtime and 6.0.10 packages #44963
  • Perf improvement: https #44995
  • Blazor WASM project won't build due to missing browser-wasm 7.0.0-rtm.22473.12 package #44872
    7.0.x
  • QuickGrid Sorting - JSON Parsing Error #44851
  • [FromBody] parameter is null #44992
  • Allow Blazor components with [Parameter] attributes on properties to be aware of the required modifier. #44974
  • Blazor compatibilty with Wisej using custom elements #44982
  • Migration from 6 to 7 gives Uncaught SyntaxError: import.meta may only appear in a module #44996
  • PersistentComponentState: persist state outside OnPersisting callback #44936
  • Argument "3": Cannot convert from „Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.EventCallback<System.DateTime>” on „System.Action<System.DateTime>” #44955
  • Blazor Wasm MSAL authentication stuck on logging in when msal.js returns "Operation Completed" #43317
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Monitor HTTP response buffer to detect lagging #44761
  • dynamic endpoint in controller #44790

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45011
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Add template for analyzer/codefixer proposals #45009
    area-infrastructure
  • [7.0] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45008
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • gRPC JSON transcoding - msbuild includes proto dependencies #44999
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Update branding to 2.1.39, merge internal commits #44951
    tell-mode, 2.1.39
  • [release/7.0] source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #44978
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [6.0] Match strangely formatted PathBase #42751 #44753
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.12
  • Revert init-nuget workaround #45005
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #44949
  • Fix `Excepted` -> `Expected` typos in repo #44989
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] source-build: don't use crossgen when building for mono runtime. #44977
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/2.1] nit: Update `$(RepositoryUrl)` #44994
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Updated

  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22556.1 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Use the Regex source generator in the AlphaRouteConstraint. #44770
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2042165 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
